operation.name: createDeveloperAppKeys
operation.description: Create 2 application keys for given user; one active and the other delayed

parameter.name: appName
parameter.description: A Display name for the application.

simpleResponse.description: A map of application keys, one marked ACTIVE, and the other DELAYED

exception.description: Generic exception that is thrown if this operation fails for any reason.

operation.name: getDeveloperAppKeys
operation.description: Get all application keys owned by the given developer/vendor

simpleResponse.description: A list of application keys owned by the given developer/vendor

exception.description: Generic exception that is thrown if this operation fails for any reason.

operation.name: getAccountFunds
operation.description: Get available to bet amount.

parameter.name: wallet
parameter.description: Name of the wallet in question.

simpleResponse.description: Response for retrieving available to bet.

exception.description: Generic exception that is thrown if this operation fails for any reason.

operation.name: transferFunds
operation.description: Transfer funds between wallets

simpleResponse.description: Response for transfer funds action

exception.description: Generic exception that is thrown if this operation fails for any reason.

operation.name: getAccountDetails
operation.description: Get Account details.

simpleResponse.description: Response for retrieving account details.

exception.description: Generic exception that is thrown if this operation fails for any reason.

operation.name: getVendorClientId
operation.description: Get vendor client id for customer account.

simpleResponse.description: Vendor client id.

exception.description: Generic exception that is thrown if this operation fails for any reason.

operation.name: getApplicationSubscriptionToken
operation.description: Returns the newly generate subscription token

parameter.name: subscriptionLength
parameter.description: How many days the subscription should last. Open ended if value not supplied. Expiry time will be rounded up to midnight on the date of expiry.

parameter.name: clientReference
parameter.description: Any client reference for this subscription token request.

simpleResponse.description: Subscription token

exception.description: Generic exception that is thrown if this operation fails for any reason.

operation.name: activateApplicationSubscription
operation.description: Activate the subscription token for the customer

exception.description: Generic exception that is thrown if this operation fails for any reason.

operation.name: cancelApplicationSubscription
operation.description: Cancel application subscription

exception.description: Generic exception that is thrown if this operation fails for any reason.

operation.name: updateApplicationSubscription
operation.description: Update an application subscription with a new expiry date

parameter.name: vendorClientId
parameter.description: The vendor client id for which to update the subscription for

parameter.name: subscriptionLength
parameter.description: How many days the subscription should last. Expiry time will be rounded up to midnight on the date of expiry.

simpleResponse.description: Subscription token

exception.description: Generic exception that is thrown if this operation fails for any reason

operation.name: listApplicationSubscriptionTokens
operation.description: List of subscription tokens for an application

parameter.name: subscriptionStatus
parameter.description: Optionally filter response by Subscription status of the token

simpleResponse.description: List of subscription tokens for an application

exception.description: Generic exception that is thrown if this operation fails for any reason.

operation.name: listAccountSubscriptionTokens
operation.description: List of subscription tokens associated with the account

simpleResponse.description: List of subscription tokens associated with the account

exception.description: Generic exception that is thrown if this operation fails for any reason.

operation.name: getApplicationSubscriptionHistory
operation.description: Identify all subscriptions, regardless of status, for a single client for a single application key. The operation may be called by either the application key owner or a client.

parameter.name: vendorClientId
parameter.description: A vendor client id must be provided if this operation is being called by the application key owner. nb. The presence of an x-application header implies that this operation is being called by the application key owner. A vendor client id will be ignored, if the operation is being called by the client. nb. The absence of an x-application header implies that this operation is being called by the client.

parameter.name: applicationKey
parameter.description: If the operation is called by the client then an applicationKey must be provided as a parameter (as opposed to a x-application header)

simpleResponse.description: List of subscriptions, regardless of status, associated with the client account for a single application key

exception.description: Generic exception that is thrown if this operation fails for any reason.

operation.name: getAccountStatement
operation.description: Get account statement

parameter.name: locale
parameter.description: The language to be used where applicable. If not specified, the customer account default is returned.

parameter.name: fromRecord
parameter.description: Specifies the first record that will be returned. Records start at index zero. If not specified then it will default to 0.

parameter.name: recordCount
parameter.description: Specifies the maximum number of records to be returned. Note that there is a page size limit of 100. If not specified then it will default to the page limit size.

parameter.name: itemDateRange
parameter.description:
Return items with an itemDate within this date range. Both from and to date times are inclusive. If from is not specified then the oldest available items will be in range. If to is not specified then the latest items will be in range.
nb. This itemDataRange is currently only applied when includeItem is set to ALL or not specified, else items are NOT bound by itemDate.

parameter.name: includeItem
parameter.description: Which items to include, if not specified then defaults to ALL.

parameter.name: wallet
parameter.description: Which wallet to return statementItems for. If unspecified then the UK wallet will be selected

simpleResponse.description: List of statement items chronologically ordered plus moreAvailable boolean to facilitate paging

exception.description: Generic exception that is thrown if this operation fails for any reason.

operation.name: listCurrencyRates
operation.description: Returns a list of currency rates based on given currency

parameter.name: fromCurrency
parameter.description: The currency from which the rates are computed. GBP is used if no value is passed

simpleResponse.description: List of currency rates

exception.description: Generic exception that is thrown if this operation fails for any reason.

operation.name: getAuthorisationCode
operation.description: Generate auth code for web vendor, used to get vendor session

simpleResponse.description: Response object containing the authorisation code and the redirect url

exception.description: Generic exception that is thrown if this operation fails for any reason

operation.name: token
operation.description: Generate web vendor session based on a standard session identifiable by auth code, vendor secret and app key

parameter.name: grant_type
parameter.description: Whether the vendor is using an authorisation code or a refresh token to get a session

parameter.name: code
parameter.description: The authorisation code used to lookup the session to be returned

parameter.name: client_secret
parameter.description: The vendor's private key used to verify their identity

parameter.name: refresh_token
parameter.description: The vendor's refresh token if the grant_type is refresh_token

simpleResponse.description: Response object containing VendorAccessToken, RefreshToken and optionally a Subscription Token if one was created

exception.description: Generic exception that is thrown if this operation fails for any reason

operation.name: getVendorDetails
operation.description: Return details about a vendor from its identifier. Response includes Vendor Name and URL.

simpleResponse.description: Response object containing the vendor and the redirect url

exception.description: Generic exception that is thrown if this operation fails for any reason

operation.name: revokeAccessToWebApp
operation.description: Remove the link between an account and a vendor web app. This will remove the refreshToken for this user-vendor pair subscription.

parameter.name: vendorId
parameter.description: The id of the vendor to revoke access for

simpleResponse.description: Returns whether the request was successful or not

exception.description: Generic exception that is thrown if this operation fails for any reason

operation.name: listAuthorizedWebApps
operation.description: Retrieve all vendors applications currently subscribed to by the user making the request

simpleResponse.description: A list of all vendor subscriptions the user has subscribed to

exception.description: Generic exception that is thrown if this operation fails for any reason

operation.name: isAccountSubscribedToWebApp
operation.description: Return whether an account has authorised a web app.

parameter.name: vendorId
parameter.description: The id of the vendor to check subscription for

simpleResponse.description: Subscribed or not

exception.description: Generic exception that is thrown if this operation fails for any reason

operation.name: getAffiliateRelation
operation.description: Return relation between a list of users and an affiliate

parameter.name: vendorClientIds
parameter.description: List of client ids to check affiliation on

simpleResponse.description: List of affiliate relation status per user

exception.description: Generic exception that is thrown if this operation fails for any reason.

parameter.name: transactionId
parameter.description: The id of the transfer transaction that will be used in tracking the transfers between the wallets

parameter.name: accountStatement
parameter.description: The list of statement items returned by your request.

parameter.name: moreAvailable
parameter.description: Indicates whether there are further result items beyond this page.

parameter.name: refId
parameter.description: An external reference, eg. equivalent to betId in the case of an exchange bet statement item.

parameter.name: itemDate
parameter.description: The date and time of the statement item, eg. equivalent to settledData for an exchange bet statement item. (in ISO-8601 format, not translated)

parameter.name: amount
parameter.description: The amount of money the balance is adjusted by

parameter.name: itemClass
parameter.description: Class of statement item. This value will determine which set of keys will be included in itemClassData

parameter.name: itemClassData
parameter.description: Key value pairs describing the current statement item. The set of keys will be determined by the itemClass

parameter.name: legacyData
parameter.description: Set of fields originally returned from APIv6. Provided to facilitate migration from APIv6 to API-NG, and ultimately onto itemClass and itemClassData

parameter.name: appName
parameter.description: The unique name of the application

parameter.name: appId
parameter.description: A unique id of this application

dataType.name: DeveloperAppVersion
dataType.description: Describes a version of an external application

parameter.name: owner
parameter.description: The sportex user who owns the specific version of the application

parameter.name: versionId
parameter.description: The unique Id of the application version

parameter.name: version
parameter.description: The version identifier string such as 1.0, 2.0. Unique for a given application.

parameter.name: applicationKey
parameter.description: The unqiue application key associated with this application version

parameter.name: delayData
parameter.description: Indicates whether the data exposed by platform services as seen by this application key is delayed or realtime.

parameter.name: subscriptionRequired
parameter.description: Indicates whether the application version needs explicit subscription

parameter.name: ownerManaged
parameter.description: Indicates whether the application version needs explicit management by producers. A value of false indicates, this is a version meant for developer use.

parameter.name: active
parameter.description: Indicates whether the application version is currently active

parameter.name: vendorId
parameter.description: Public unique string provided to the Vendor that they can use to pass to the Betfair API in order to identify themselves.

parameter.name: vendorSecret
parameter.description: Private unique string provided to the Vendor that they pass with certain calls to confirm their identity. Linked to a particular App Key.

dataType.name: AccountFundsResponse
dataType.description: Response for retrieving available to bet.

parameter.name: rate
parameter.description: Exchange rate for the currency specified in the request

dataType.name: AuthorisationResponse
dataType.description: Wrapper object containing authorisation code and redirect URL for web vendors

parameter.name: redirectUrl
parameter.description: URL to redirect the user to the vendor page

dataType.name: SubscriptionOptions
dataType.description: Wrapper object containing details of how a subscription should be created

parameter.name: subscription_length
parameter.description: How many days should a created subscription last for. Open ended subscription created if value not provided. Relevant only if createdSubscription is true.

parameter.name: subscription_token
parameter.description: An existing subscription token that the caller wishes to be activated instead of creating a new one. Ignored is createSubscription is true.

parameter.name: client_reference
parameter.description: Any client reference for this subscription token request.

dataType.name: VendorAccessTokenInfo
dataType.description: Wrapper object containing UserVendorSessionToken, RefreshToken and optionally a Subscription Token if one was created

parameter.name: access_token
parameter.description: Session token used by web vendors

parameter.name: expires_in
parameter.description: How long until the token expires

parameter.name: refresh_token
parameter.description: Token used to refresh the session token in future

parameter.name: application_subscription
parameter.description: Object containing the vendor client id and optionally some subscription information

dataType.name: VendorDetails
dataType.description: Wrapper object containing vendor name and redirect url

dataType.name: AffiliateRelation
dataType.description: Wrapper object containing affiliate relation details

exceptionType.name: AccountAPINGException
exceptionType.description: This exception is thrown when an operation fails

parameter.name: errorCode
parameter.description: the unique code for this error

value.name: INVALID_INPUT_DATA
value.description: Invalid input data

value.name: INVALID_SESSION_INFORMATION
value.description: The session token passed is invalid or expired

value.name: UNEXPECTED_ERROR
value.description: An unexpected internal error occurred that prevented successful request processing.

value.name: INVALID_APP_KEY
value.description: The application key passed is invalid

value.name: SERVICE_BUSY
value.description: The service is currently too busy to service this request

value.name: TIMEOUT_ERROR
value.description: Internal call to downstream service timed out

value.name: DUPLICATE_APP_NAME
value.description: Duplicate application name

value.name: APP_KEY_CREATION_FAILED
value.description: Creating application key version has failed

value.name: APP_CREATION_FAILED
value.description: Application creation has been failed

value.name: NO_SESSION
value.description: A session token is required for this operation

value.name: NO_APP_KEY
value.description: An application key is required for this operation

value.name: SUBSCRIPTION_EXPIRED
value.description: An application key is required for this operation

value.name: INVALID_SUBSCRIPTION_TOKEN
value.description: An application key is required for this operation

value.name: TOO_MANY_REQUESTS
value.description: Too many requests

value.name: INVALID_CLIENT_REF
value.description: Invalid length for the client reference

value.name: WALLET_TRANSFER_ERROR
value.description: There was a problem transferring funds between your wallets

value.name: INVALID_VENDOR_CLIENT_ID
value.description: The vendor client ID is not subscribed to this application key

value.name: USER_NOT_SUBSCRIBED
value.description: The user making the request is not subscribed to the application key they are trying to perform the action on (e.g. creating an Authorisation Code)

value.name: INVALID_SECRET
value.description: The vendor making the request has provided a vendor secret that does not match our records

value.name: INVALID_AUTH_CODE
value.description: The vendor making the request has not provided a valid authorisation code

value.name: INVALID_GRANT_TYPE
value.description: The vendor making the request has not provided a valid grant_type, or the grant_type they have passed does not match the parameters (authCode/refreshToken)

parameter.name: errorDetails
parameter.description: the stack trace of the error

value.name: ALL
value.description: Any subscription status

value.name: ACTIVATED
value.description: Only activated subscriptions

value.name: UNACTIVATED
value.description: Only unactivated subscriptions

value.name: CANCELLED
value.description: Only cancelled subscriptions

value.name: EXPIRED
value.description: Only expired subscriptions

value.name: SUCCESS
value.description: Sucess status

value.name: UNKNOWN
value.description: Statement item not mapped to a specific class. All values will be concatenated into a single key/value pair. The key will be 'unknownStatementItem' and the value will be a comma separated string.

value.name: INVALID_USER
value.description: Provided vendor client ID is not valid

value.name: AFFILIATED
value.description: Vendor client ID valid and affiliated

value.name: NOT_AFFILIATED
value.description: Vendor client ID valid but not affiliated
